channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟡 10:35 Flashing anxiety in Dnipropetrovsk Oblast. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Manganese and Marganetsky Territorial Community, Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community- Chervono-Grigoriva Territorial Community
item.description: 🟡 10:35 Flashing anxiety in Dnipropetrovsk Oblast. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Manganese and Marganetsky Territorial Community, Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community- Chervono-Grigoriva Territorial Community#Dnepropetrovsk_. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
